title: got reported by bug and now i need to wait 10 min
body: i started a game with nocturne and i bought all starting items then when  tried to exit the base i couldnt and i left the game cuz my teammates said so. when i reconnected i finaly got out the base but there was this rude player called wordman78 and he called me noob and all that offensive things. and end of the game i got reported for single thing and i got 10 min. then i got put in low priority queue so riot can u plz fix that and delete those things if u can it would be nice thank you :) :)

replies.body:
When a player disconnects from a match, it negatively impacts everyone in the match, regardless of intent. This is a prime reason why [the system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally and why any penalties cannot be removed or modified. 

The 10-minute low priority queue isn't handed out on the first time a disconnection happens. It takes a trend of disconnections before this penalty is added to an account. The issue you described sounds a lot like packet loss, which is often caused by local network configurations that clash with League or routing issues to the server. While there are a number of potential causes to this issue, our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped out.
